h1_title: How to Unlock the Chapter 2 Secret Area
h2_title: How to Find the Yellow-Robed Squire (Drunken Boar NPC)
content: The first step to getting into the Chapter 2 secret area is to find the **Yellow-Robed Squire.** You won't be able to do this until you pass through Sandgate Village and into Fright Cliff. Pass by the Squall Hideout Keeper’s Shrine and continue on the Rockrest Flat.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Unlock_the_Chapter_2_Secret_Area.md', within the main section titled 'How to Unlock the Chapter 2 Secret Area', specifically from the subsection 'How to Find the Yellow-Robed Squire (Drunken Boar NPC)'.
The content is as follows:
The first step to getting into the Chapter 2 secret area is to find the **Yellow-Robed Squire.** You won't be able to do this until you pass through Sandgate Village and into Fright Cliff. Pass by the Squall Hideout Keeper’s Shrine and continue on the Rockrest Flat.
